>::Orchestra::
>
>      Orchestra thought about the mission and the objective.
>
>      "No suggestions here right now," Orchestra said, "I might have an 
>idea that could help us at least hinder a faction if they aren't expecting 
>it."
>
>      "See, I'm thinking we could hurt them bad, with a little espionage!  
>I could sneak into a base and sabotage devices, shields, and things like 
>that, as well as listen in on plans and conversations of importance," 
>Orchestra explained, "Or, I could lower the risk by pretending to join 
>them, and do all the things listed above, except better, 'cause of less 
>risk of being caught and shot.  So, what do ya think?"
